nodes.text: Vilmarh Grahrk: A Devil of a Smuggler

"Vilmarh Grahrk: A Devil of a Smuggler" was an online supplement for Star Wars Roleplaying Game. It was written by J.D. Wiker and published on the Wizards of the Coast website. The article provided biography and game stats for Vilmarh Grahrk, the devaronian smuggler from the Star Wars: Republic and Jedi Council: Acts of War comic series.
